name: OpenMenu
description: OpenMenu is changing the way restaurants manage their menus, information and deal/coupons online.  One place to manage, one place to edit, updated everywhere.

apis.name: OpenMenu
apis.description: The only way for the restaurant industry to progress forward in the digital age is to scrap the old methods of presenting, sharing, distributing and working with the detailed information about a restaurant (including, and probably most importantly, all information about their menus) and adopt a new, standardized, centralized way.
